title: Families Of U.S. Women's Soccer Players Share Rituals For Calming Nerves
teaser: Game day can bring butterflies to even the toughest athletes. Nerves also follow the families of U.S. women's soccer players. Some pace, while others mutter coping rituals that help them get through the game.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
